body.name: Hydro Flask Kids Wide Mouth Straw Lid and Boot
features: Enjoy optimum drinking temperature for hours: Our TempShield double wall, vacuum insulated technology guards the temperature of your drink. It also ensures no condensation or heat transfer to the outside of the bottle and therefore cold beverages stay cold for hours in this bottle
BPA-Free kids water bottle: All of our bottles are made with pro-grade stainless steel, a robust metal known for its resistance and purity. It also protects against the transfer of flavours

Practical Easy Sip Straw Lid: This bottle comes with a colourful, easy-to-clean Wide Mouth Straw Lid, which is simple to use and makes it convenient for children to drink from the bottle. Please note that the Wide Mouth Straw Lid is not leakproof and is not intended for use with hot liquids

Just the right size for little hands: Our proprietary powder coat is easy to grip, sweat-free, and durable – so you can take your HYDRO FLASK anywhere, to school or for hobbies. It also fits into most backpacks and standard cup holders. The bottle is dishwasher safe for easy cleaning, with a hand washable lid

100% Customer and product satisfaction warranty: We stand behind our products and have great faith in our products. HYDRO FLASK is committed to high standards of durable and robust materials. HYDRO FLASK guarantees this product with a limited lifetime warranty against manufacturer defects
body.description: Ready for the playground. Every sip stays icy cold for up to 24 hours – so when playtime wraps up, the perfect refreshment is waiting on the sidelines. With a colorful, easy-to-clean Straw Cap and a durable perforated Flex Boot, the Wide Mouth Kids Bottle is the perfect companion for any adventure – big or small.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: My husband and I both have the 40oz water bottles so we wanted to get our daughter one too. If this bottle can survive our insane toddle, it can survive anything haha! It’s definitely not leak proof and will spill water if turned but keeps beverages cold for a very long time and is able to take quite a beating.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great sturdy water bottle for kids
reviews.reviewText: My kids have this water bottle for school. It keeps water nice and cold and is super easy to wash. The silicone boot at the bottom of the water bottle is great but it does makes it harder to slip into some water bottle holders on the side of my kids backpack due to the size/silicone “stickiness”. it fits in my daughter’s Pottery Barn Kids backpack side pocket but not very well in my son’s North Face backpack. But overall it’s an excellent water bottle and has been able to withstand a ton of abuse from my kids!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 18, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So far so good
reviews.reviewText: I will update review after a while but it arrived in good condition. It leaks if the spout is open and there is liquid left in the straw. And from the small hole on top of the lid that allows suction. But when the spout is closed it does not leak. Not sure how cold the liquid stays yet but I will find out when my daughter has her backpack on the outside coat rack at school in 106° weather.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for young kids
reviews.reviewText: I love that this has the rubber bottom for kids who drop a lot. Perfect size for toddlers or preschool age kids

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best water bottle ever
reviews.reviewText: I got this for my daughter and put ice in it every morning and by the time she gets home there is still ice in it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A silicon bottom that stays on!
reviews.reviewText: This is a great water bottle for my daughter to take to school! The silicone bottom stays on so no more loud clangs when she drops it. It fits easily in her backpack pocket. I also appreciate the strong handle that will last through the school year!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars It only leaks at specific angles
reviews.reviewText: I bought this cup to replace my 17-month-old’s Tommy Tippy straw cup for water. I hate the taste imparted by silicone straws. My friend recommended this Hydroflask because of how easy it is to clean, and I 100% agree. If you have any basic brush set for cleaning bottle parts, you can easily get to every crevice in this cup’s lid. No hidden traps for water to collect and mold to grow. Very simple design.This cup definitely tastes better too. No soapy taste after washing (unlike silicone or flimsier plastic), and a decent flow through the straw because there’s no check valve forcing the toddler to sip really hard to get the water out. My child actually drinks a lot more water now that she has this cup.To address the leaking issues, yes it leaks, but not as bad as the “leak proof” straw cups with check valves, where the liquid just bubbles up and pools everywhere while it’s sitting completely upright. This cup leaks at a very specific angle. I bought the pink cup first, and it leaked only at 45 degrees or so, and only for a second before it stopped. I was so impressed that I bought another one—the green cup—and this one only leaks when my child has it lying flat on the floor, and only occasionally. And when it does leak, it doesn’t stop—just creates a huge puddle until it’s empty. My partner and I have tried to recreate the scenario in which that happens, but the cup behaves perfectly when we’re trying it—no leaking. It’s frustrating to figure it out, but here’s the bottom line: I don’t really leave this cup alone with my toddler anyway because if she dropped it on her foot, she’d probably break a toe it’s so heavy. So it doesn’t have too many opportunities to leak all over the house, and when she’s older and can be trusted carrying it around, she’ll set it down upright anyway. So the leaking isn’t a deal breaker, and the cup is a huge improvement over anything else we’ve used.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Holds up to kids
reviews.reviewText: My kids are hard on water bottles and I was getting tired of getting the cheaper ones at target and Costco to have them break after after a few weeks. This bottle (and the other three I’ve since bought) still looks brand new and if the lid ever breaks I can buy a replacement. This is worth the higher up front cost!
Chegou certinho, veio um canudo e outro reserva (dois canudos no total)

Estaba dudando en comprarlo porque vi muchos comentarios que decían que el agua se tira. Me animé a comprarlo y no me arrepiento, si se tira el agua pero solo si está abierta la parte de la boquilla, cuando está cerrada no he tenido el problema de que se tire el agua. Buena calidad del producto, bonito y a mi hijo de 2 años le gusta
